alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 9:06PM EST until February 19 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Withlacoochee River near Quitman (US 84) affecting Brooks and Lowndes Counties. For the Withlacoochee River...including Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd) and Quitman (US 84)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee River near Quitman (US 84). * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 106.0 feet, In Lowndes County, the boat ramp at the Clyattville Nankin road is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 102.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday evening to a crest of 105.2 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 104.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 105.2 feet on 03/21/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning.
